Class Book

    • Book

      public Book(int bookID, String title, String author, String genre, int publicationYear, String isbn, double rating, double price, String description, String readingURL, String imageURL)
      Constructor for creating a book instance.
      Parameters:
      bookID - Integer representing the book id.
      title - String representing the book title.
      author - String representing the book author.
      genre - String representing the book genre.
      publicationYear - Integer representing the book's publication year.
      isbn - String representing the book's isbn.
      rating - Double representing the book's average isbn.
      price - Double representing the book's price.
      description - String representing the book's description.
      readingURL - String representing the book's reading URL.
      imageURL - String representing the book's image URL.

    • Book

      public Book(Book otherBook, String userCategoryID)
      Constructor for instantiating a copy of the book for the user library
      Parameters:
      otherBook - The book to be copied
      userCategoryID - The new category of the book should be in.
